description.english: Play a total of ten games of your choice
description.french: Fais dix jeux à ton choix
description.italian: Fai dieci giochi a tua scelta
description.spanish: Elige un total de diez juegos
description.schinese: 开始玩十个你选择的游戏
description.tchinese: 開始玩十個你選擇的遊戲
description.japanese: 選択した10ゲームをプレイ
description.portuguese: Jogue um total de dez partidas de sua escolha

description.spanish: Intercambia tres Comodines en un juego
description.japanese: 1ゲームで3ジョーカーを交換
description.portuguese: Troque três Curingas em uma partida

displayName.japanese: ジェントルマンクラブ

description.english: Have only Gentlemen in your card supply
description.french: Ta main ne comporte que de seigneurs
description.italian: La tua mano contiene solo signori
description.spanish: Tienes solo hombres en tu fajo de cartas
description.schinese: 你的牌只有男士可以拿取
description.tchinese: 你的牌只有男士可以拿取
description.japanese: 配布カードは男性のみ
description.portuguese: Tenha apenas cavalheiros em suas cartas
description.russian: Получите в качестве всех активных карт только джентльменов

description.english: There are only Ladies in your card supply
description.german: Es gibt nur Damen in Deinem Kartenvorrat
description.french: Il n'y a que dames dans ta main
description.italian: La tua mano contiene solo signore
description.spanish: Solo hay mujeres en el fajo de cartas
description.schinese: 你的牌只有女士可以拿取
description.tchinese: 你的牌只有女士可以拿取
description.japanese: 配布カードは女性のみ
description.portuguese: Tenha apenas senhoras em suas cartas
description.russian: Получите в качестве всех активных карт только леди

description.english: Play the complete hand to tables
description.german: Spiele die gesamte Hand an Tische aus
description.french: Joue ta main entière aux tables
description.italian: Gioca la mano completa ai tavoli
description.spanish: Juega la mano completa en las mesas
description.schinese: 玩已成形的牌，如顺、同花、葫芦
description.tchinese: 玩已成形的牌，如順、同花、葫蘆
description.japanese: コンプリートハンドをプレイ
description.portuguese: Jogue uma mão completa para as mesas
description.russian: Разыграйте все активные карты на руке за столами

description.english: Clear two tables at a time
description.german: Räume zwei Tische auf einmal ab
description.french: Complète deux tables en meme temps
description.italian: Completa due tavoli allo stesso tempo
description.spanish: Retira dos mesas de una vez
description.portuguese: Limpe duas mesas ao mesmo tempo

description.english: Clear three tables at a time
description.german: Räume drei Tische auf einmal ab
description.french: Complète trois tables en meme temps
description.italian: Completa tre tavoli allo stesso tempo
description.spanish: Retira tres mesas de una vez
description.portuguese: Limpe três mesas ao mesmo tempo

displayName.japanese: エクスプレス エスプレッソ

description.english: Play 5 consecutive cards to tables in less than 10 sec. each (Time Game)
description.german: Spiele im Zeitspiel 5 Karten nacheinander in je weniger als 10 sek. an Tische
description.french: Place 5 cartes consécutives aux tables en moins de 10 secondes (Jeu contre la montre)
description.italian: Gioca 5 carte consecutive ai tavoli in meno di 10 sec.
description.spanish: Juega 5 cartas consecutivas en las mesas en menos de 10 seg. Cada una (Juego contrarreloj)
description.schinese: 连发五张牌，每张牌的发牌时间间隔必须少於十秒
description.tchinese: 連發五張牌，每張牌的發牌時間間隔必須少於十秒
description.japanese: 10秒以内で5連続カードをプレイ(時間戦)
description.portuguese: Jogue cinco cartas consecutivas para as mesas com menos de dez segundos entre cada uma no Modo Cronômetro
description.russian: Разыграйте последовательно 5 карт за столами менее, чем за 10 секунд (в Игре на время)

description.english: Score more than 15.000 points in Time Game
description.german: Gewinne mehr als 15,000 Punkte im Zeitspiel
description.french: Gagne plus de 15,000 points au jeu contre la montre
description.italian: Vinci più di 15,000 punti contro l´orologio
description.spanish: Gana más de 15.000 puntos en el Juego Contrarreloj
description.schinese: 在限时游戏里得到多于15,000分
description.tchinese: 在限時遊戲裡得到多於15,000分
description.japanese: 時間戦で15,000 ポイント以上獲得
description.portuguese: Obtenha mais de 15000 pontos no Modo Cronômetro
description.russian: Наберите более 15.000 очков в Игре на время

description.english: Earn at least 650 points in a classic game

description.tchinese: 在傳統遊戲裡賺取至少650分
description.japanese: 対戦で最低650ポイント獲得
description.portuguese: Obtenha ao menos 650 pontos no Modo Clássico
description.russian: Наберите не менее 650 очков за партию в Классической игре

description.english: Score at least 400 points in solitaire game

description.spanish: Puntua 400 puntos como mínimo en el Juego Solitario
description.schinese: 在接龙游戏里得到至少400分
description.tchinese: 在接龍遊戲裡得到至少400分
description.japanese: 個人戦で最低400ポイント獲得
description.portuguese: Obtenha ao menos 400 pontos no Modo Paciência
description.russian: Наберите не менее 400 очков за партию в Пасьянсе

displayName.french: Le héros du jeu contre la montre

description.spanish: Gana más de 20.000 puntos en el juego Contrarreloj

description.tchinese: 在限時遊戲裡得到多於20.000分

displayName.japanese: オクトーバーフェスト

description.english: Complete two German nation tables in a game
description.german: Bilde zwei deutsche Nationentische in einem Spiel

description.spanish: Completa dos mesas de nacionalidad alemana en un solo juego

description.tchinese: 在遊戲裡結束兩桌只有德國人的桌

description.russian: Очистите два немецких стола за партию

description.tchinese: 在傳統遊戲裏賺取至少1,000分
